A quick check of Oppi Untracht's "Jewelry Concepts and Technology" yielded a few synonyms for nunome and places where it is still being practiced...

Koftgari in Trivandrum, India; Tela-kubi in Qasvin, Iran; Taraceado in Toledo, Spain.

A Google search on koftgari turned up many weapon-related links.  Two on the technique are below:

http://www.ethnictourism.com/news/koft.asp
http://www.womenexcel.com/fashion/jewelmaking.htm#6

I didn't have any luck searching on the other terms.
Jim
